Texts.Chs: 以守护者身份毕业后，我将回到以利提亚（埃利西亚）一段时间：以利提亚领导人希望获得我在这里的完整报告。 我会想念守护团庭园的，但再次回到家会很好。
Texts.Eng: After my graduation as a Protector, I will return to Elithia for some time: the Elithian leaders will want a full report of my time here. I'll miss the Protectorate, but it'll be good to be home again.

Texts.Chs: 当快要结束训练时，我相信加入守护团是我曾做出的最佳决定。 对于人类以及守护团的其他种族我学到了许多。 联盟与守护团之间的贸易路线正在建立，所有其他条约均已协定和签署，看来我们大家都有光明的未来！
Texts.Eng: As I'm nearing the end of my training, I am certain that joining the Protectorate was the best decision I could have made. I have learned so much about the Humans, and the other races of the Protectorate as well. Trade routes between the Alliance and the Protectorate are being set up, and with all the other treaties being written and signed, it looks like we all have a bright future ahead of us!

Texts.Chs:
日记 条目 24 

虽然发现大地守护团仅仅数载，但以利提亚联盟的领导人几乎立即决定发起与该组织的友好交流。 与其他人一样，林茵（Lyiin）海军上将得知地球上仍然还有人类而感到异常兴奋，我也分享了他们的喜悦之情！
Texts.Eng:
JOURNAL ENTRY 24

The Terrene Protectorate was only discovered a few years ago, but the leaders of the Elithian Alliance almost immediately decided to initiate friendly communication with the organization. Like the other Aegi, Admiral Lyiin was incredibly excited to learn that there were still Humans on Earth, and I shared their excitement!

Texts.Chs: 我的主要任务是报名参加守护团培训计划，因此成为最早的埃癸人守护者之一。 我也将担任埃癸人民，联盟，当然还有整个同盟（Alliance）的大使。
Texts.Eng: My assignment was to enroll in the Protectorate training program, and so become one of the first Aeginian Protectors. I would also act as an ambassador for the Aeginian people, the Union, and of course, the Alliance as a whole.

Texts.Chs: 当以利提亚领导层开始招募大使派往守护团时，我是第一个签约的人。 还有比能够看到我们的祖先行星，并遇到我们演化源头的古老种族更加难得的机会吗？ 真可谓是一期一会！
Texts.Eng: When the Elithian leadership started recruiting ambassadors to send to the Protectorate, I was amongst the first to sign up. A chance to see our ancestral homeplanet, and meet the ancient race that we ourselves descended from? It was the opportunity of a lifetime!
